FuncDef:
The preference command sets the precedence of DF election for an ESI instance.
The undo preference command deletes the precedence of DF election configured for an ESI instance.
By default, no DF election precedence is configured for an ESI instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the precedence of DF election.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535. The default value is 32767. The larger the value, the higher the precedence.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In multi-homing networking, if users want to specify the master DF based on the precedence of an ESI instance, run the df-election type preference-based command to enter the preference-based view. Then, run the preferencepreference command to set a DF precedence. The larger value of preference, the higher precedence.
